newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana bourse active, index modestly up.
newsitem.headline: Ghana bourse active, index modestly up.

text.p: The Ghana Stock Exchange witnessed active trading on Friday but the share index moved up only fractionally.
The All-Share Index added a modest 0.53 points to 357.21.
There were eight price changes, with four stocks gaining and an equal number declining, on turnover of 542,330 shares. Shares offered outpaced bids by 2,771,630 to 1,135,240.

Ashanti Goldfields Co Ltd gained 100 cedis to 20,800 cedis, followed by Standard Chartered Bank, which also added 100 cedis to close at 5,000 cedis. Kumasi Brewery Ltd was five cedis higher at 685 cedis while Accra Brewery Ltd moved up three cedis to 593 cedis.

The losers were Mobil Oil Ghana Ltd down 100 cedis to 5,100 cedis, Unilever, down 10 cedis to 750 cedis, Aluminium Works which fell five cedis to 1,410 cedis and Mechanical Lloyd Co, down one cedi to 55.
